PangoXftFontunlock_face

Declaration [src] 

void
pango_xft_font_unlock_face (
  PangoFont* font
)

Description [src]

Releases a font previously obtained with pango_xft_font_lock_face().

Use pango_fc_font_unlock_face() instead.

Available since:1.2
